parameter.value: Oh, hello |PLAYERNAME|. What is it?
Good bye, and don't come back too soon.

how are you;sell;harassing;job;durin;important;name;time;help;monster;dungeon;sewer;assistant;annoying;thank you;god;king;sam;benjamin;gorn;quentin;bozo;mud;weapons;magic;power;rebellion;spell;muriel;elane;marvik;gregor;lugri;excalibug;chester;ardua;partos;gamel;sinister;goshnar;necromant;nectar
If there weren't so many people harassing me, life could be great.
Hey, I am not a shopkeeper, I am an important man!
You need not ask me about that, you are perfect in that.
I am honored to be the assistant of the great, the illustrious, the magnificent Durin!
Just between you and me, he can be quite a tyrant.
I am honored to be the assistant of the great, the illustrious, the magnificent Durin!
My name is Oswald, but let's proceed, I am a very busy man.
It is nearly tea time, so please hurry!
I inform higher officials of your need... sometimes.
AHHHH!!! WHERE??? WHERE???
If you want to see dungeons just don't pay your taxes.
Our sewer system is very modern, but crowded with rats and wannabe heroes.
I have a job of great responsibility, mostly I keep annoying persons away from my boss.
You better don't ask, you wouldn't like the answer.
You are... uhm... welcome. Are you finished already?
I think the gods are too busy to care about us mortals, hmm... that makes me feel godlike, too.
Ah, yes, yes, hail to King Tibianus! Long live the king and so on...
A simple shopkeeper with minor intelligence.
What do you expect from ex-soldiers? He is nuts! Hacked on the head far too often.
He sells his scrolls far too expensive.
I heard he was a ladies' man in younger days. In our days he is rumoured to wear women clothes now and then.
Isn't he the artist formerly known as the prince?
I heared Sam dated a female mud-wrestler once.
It's rumoured that Sam does not forge all weapons himself, but buys them from his cousin, who is married to a cyclops.
I overheard a conversation of officials, that magic will be forbidden soon.
There are people who talk about a rebellion against King Tibianus.
There are people who talk about a rebellion against King Tibianus.
I was told sometimes that sorcerers are toasted by misfired spells of their own.
He is rumoured to summon kinky demons to... well you know.
They say she killed over a dozen husbands already.
Who knows what this old man is up to in his hideout when no one is watching?
I was told he lost a body part or two in duels... if you know what I mean.
Some say he is Ferumbras in disguise.
It's beyond all doubt that certain sinister elements in our city have certain knowledge about this myth.
I never found any rumour concerning him, isn't that odd?
She's a bitch, trust me. She was the girlfriend of the evil Partos some time ago.
What a shame. He claimed to be the king of thiefs and was caught stealing some fruit.
This man lives in the darkness like a rat and is also as handsome as one of them. He surely is up to no good and often consorts with sinister strangers.
Just last week a one eyed man, who had a room at Frodo's, met him in the middle of the night.
They say he isn't truly dead. He was... or is a necromant after all.
You are not the first one to ask about that. Am I the only one that preferes wine to such disgusting stuff?
You are not the first one to ask about that. Am I the only one that preferes wine to such disgusting stuff?
